json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="hours">
<prop type="array" name="minutes">
<prop type="array" name="monthDays">
<prop type="array" name="monthlyOccurrences">
<prop type="array" name="weekDays">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$batchConfiguration.properties.releaseCriteria.recurrence.schedule.hours" options="hours">
<arg type="array" var="$batchConfiguration.properties.releaseCriteria.recurrence.schedule.minutes" options="minutes">
<arg type="array" var="$batchConfiguration.properties.releaseCriteria.recurrence.schedule.monthDays" options="month-days">
<arg type="array" var="$batchConfiguration.properties.releaseCriteria.recurrence.schedule.monthlyOccurrences" options="monthly-occurrences">
<arg type="array" var="$batchConfiguration.properties.releaseCriteria.recurrence.schedule.weekDays" options="week-days">

<prop type="array" name="hours" arg="$batchConfiguration.properties.releaseCriteria.recurrence.schedule.hours">

<prop type="array" name="monthlyOccurrences" arg="$batchConfiguration.properties.releaseCriteria.recurrence.schedule.monthlyOccurrences">
<prop type="array" name="weekDays" arg="$batchConfiguration.properties.releaseCriteria.recurrence.schedule.weekDays">

<prop type="array" name="monthlyOccurrences">
<prop type="array" name="weekDays">

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$batchConfiguration.properties.releaseCriteria.recurrence.schedule.hours" options="hours">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$batchConfiguration.properties.releaseCriteria.recurrence.schedule.minutes" options="minutes">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$batchConfiguration.properties.releaseCriteria.recurrence.schedule.monthDays" options="month-days">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$batchConfiguration.properties.releaseCriteria.recurrence.schedule.monthlyOccurrences" options="monthly-occurrences">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$batchConfiguration.properties.releaseCriteria.recurrence.schedule.weekDays" options="week-days">

<prop type="array" name="weekDays">
